title: The Practical princess (K)
creator_credit: Nick Bosustow, Bosustow Entertainment and Sam Weiss
brief_description: When Princess Bedelia was born, the fairies gave her three gifts: beauty, grace and common sense. Her father thinks beautiful princesses don’t need common sense, but Bedelia makes good use of her brains. Based on the book by Jay Williams with animation by Vicente Bassol.
creator_credit_for_label: Nick Bosustow, Bosustow Entertainment and Sam Weiss
